actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution to insure that the quality and quantity of free broadcasting service not be impaired.

summary.text: Encourages the Federal Communications Commission to insure that the quality and quantity of over-the-air broadcasting service which is now available to the public is not impaired by the operation of pay television. Expresses the sense of Congress that the development of pay television should be regulated in a manner consistent with the maintenance of free broading.

titles.title: Resolution to insure that the quality and quantity of free broadcasting service not be impaired.
